channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Melania Trump to tell her story in memoir, ‘Melania,’ scheduled for this fall
item.description: Former first lady Melania Trump has a memoir coming out this fall, “Melania,” billed as “a powerful and inspiring story of a woman who has carved her own path, overcome adversity and defined personal excellence.”

item.title: Stock market today: Global shares tumble after a wipeout on Wall Street as Big Tech retreats
item.description: Global shares have dropped, with Tokyo’s benchmark losing more than 1,300 points at one point and closing 3.3% lower, as pessimism set in over Wall Street’s overnight nose-dive.

item.title: With big goals and gambles, Paris aims to reset the Olympics with audacious Games and a wow opening
item.description: Paris has long been a city of dreamers: Just look at the Eiffel Tower, for decades the world’s loftiest structure.
